website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a reasonably priced light therapy lamp that's small, discreet, and effective, this model is worth considering.
pros: Designed specifically to address the light therapy needs of individuals who live in regions with long, dark winter climates
Has a trim design but emits bright, full-spectrum light
cons: Light occasionally flickers and turns off unexpectedly

customer_reviews.title: 10,000 lux is basically a lie, but all the manufacturers of these things lie so...
customer_reviews.text: Lux is a measure of light received per unit area, so the value depends on your distance from the light source. Measuring with my light meter at a realistic distance of 1 foot, I get around 1600 lux. You have to have the thing 4 inches from your face to get the listed 10,000 lux. Basically all the manufacturers of light therapy lamps pull this sort of bullshit. You can find more info on the problem by googling "you need more lumens".
customer_reviews.author: Echo Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Works greak.  My wife uses it daily.
customer_reviews.text: After only using this about 4 times the front plastic on the light has melted. Also the power adapter tends to get very hot during operation. The light still works but this has left me feeling that I need to very closely watch this product due to the heat issues. See photo attached. I am disappointed because my wife really needs this therapy light and I can't trust it. The plastic cover is now actually touching the LEDs. Update: The company has reached out to me to resolve my issues by sending me a new light.
customer_reviews.author: JesterOMA75

customer_reviews.title: Good light, but *not* USB or battery-operated
customer_reviews.text: Note to future purchasers: the light that currently ships is not the same as the one reviewed by most customers below. It does *not* offer a battery-operated mode, nor is it USB-powered. The power cord is also quite short. Otherwise, it offers a distinctive design and works as described. I've been using SAD lights for nearly two decades and this works as well as any other I've had.
customer_reviews.author: L Wilson

customer_reviews.title: NOT PORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: It is not portable. When you click product details, the power source says 1) corded-electric 2) Battery -- but it does not take batteries. It says it takes batteries, but it does not. How can it be portable if it is corded and does not take batteries? It is not portable because it will not work without the electrical cord that must plug into an electrical socket. Why would a product say that it takes batteries when it does not?
customer_reviews.author: Vince M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product based on a detailed review by another customer who did an extensive comparison and am very pleased with my purchase. I have had a couple of other full-spectrum lights in the past, and this one exceeds the results I've had with prior lights. From the first day, I have noticed increased alertness immediately after use. I live in the midwest, and we have many cloudy days in the winter months. This light has definitely helped to boost my energy and my mood. Thank you, Circadian Optics, for providing such a high quality light for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Diane M

customer_reviews.title: Working For Me!
customer_reviews.text: I really like how this has a very small footprint. I put it on my bedside table and turn it on when my alarm goes off and I sit up and watch the morning news. I've only had it a few days, but I do seem to be feeling more awake when I get to work. It used to take me until lunch time until I felt like I was really with it, and now I feel like I'm fine as soon as I get there. For me that's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Livin2win

customer_reviews.title: Great light source, but I'm questioning the quality of its design
customer_reviews.text: I love the light source, but I find that it is unstable when sitting on the table in the configuration that you see in the picture. I have been laying it flat on the table...And I'm disappointed in the charging adaptor....Tonight I went to unplug it, the connector that goes into the end of the unit to supply the power, separated leaving the outer circle of the connector in the unit, and the inner connector in my hand. I was able to get the outer circle out of the unit, and thankfully I had another adaptor that would fit---but how disappointing that the adaptor was so poorly made that it would separate by merely trying to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: wanda clarkemorin

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a Christmas gift. By the time my Mother admitted it was crap, it was too late to return it. Initially, the light would work for about 15-20 minutes then turned off. Sometimes it would flicker on and off erratically and then turn off all together. She kept using it for another week until it only would stay lit for a few minutes before shutting off. It never provided sustained light for long enough to provide any benefits. She gave it to me to try and now it won't even turn on. Horrible gift and total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Honprops

customer_reviews.title: Ugh. Would be a great light, but for the plug and the heat.
customer_reviews.text: It seems, got one of the last of the pre-2019 upgrades. So mine runs crazy hot and the plug is so loose the lamp only works if I prop something under the plug. I'm sure the newer version's better, but in the meantime I wasted $60 for a lamp that barely works.
customer_reviews.author: Secret Santa

customer_reviews.title: Power adapter is faulty, actual lamp is incredible while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lamp in the fall and it worked for about 2 months on my desk at work. I loved it so much. The power adapter has since stopped working and will not keep the light on unless the cord is twisted in the perfect way...even then it doesn't stay on for more than a few minutes and will not shine at full power. I have tried plugging it into different wall electric plugs and different capacity extension cords. When it did work, it was very bright and useful and would have been given 5 stars. As it is now, it's useless without a working power adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Jeny Kc

customer_reviews.title: Not very satisfied as I feel I didn’t get what was advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not very satisfied as I feel I didn’t get what was advertised. The video showed this lamp has a rechargeable battery and a usb cord. It has neither.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work for Me
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lamp to help combat my Seasonal Affective Disorder which is always worst on wet, gloomy mornings. I hoped it might help me feel more alert, but not so. It is fairly bright and does seem to make me feel peaceful, but also drowsy. It hasn't helped at all with morning alertness. As Im sitting in front of it now writing this review, I'm feeling sleepier as I write. Maybe its just the way my brain works, but this is ineffective for the purpose I intended.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lund

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I read most of the reviews for SAD lights and this seemed to be the right choice. Boy was I wrong! It worked for maybe a total 10 uses before breaking. Going to contact company for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Latham

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Trying to determine if there is any warranty for this product, we used about 10 times and it just went out. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J Pallett

customer_reviews.title: A+ and 5 STARS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This light therapy is AMAZING!!! if you have a hard time on rainy or cloudy days where you get depressed or the blues, this is wonderful! When the time just springed forward recently this was a life saver for me trying to reset my schedule waking up at 4am. i just turn it on when i wake up in the morning, and after about a week, i was back to automatically waking up without my alarm on time.I LOVE this lamp! I also turn it on sometimes in the afternoon when i start to get a bit drowsy at my desk, and it wakes me up as if though i've walked outside in the sunshine! A+ from me :)
customer_reviews.author: LoveMyAngels

customer_reviews.title: I had both eyes done this year and I felt deceived and disappointed in Amazon
customer_reviews.text: After paying full price I received the lamp only to find out while reading the accompanying booklet, on the very last page in very small print, it states that you can't use it if you have had cataract surgery. I had both eyes done this year and I felt deceived and disappointed in Amazon, not to mention angry. I no longer had the box and could find no reference to the maker, either a phone number or address in the booklet. This is an outrage.
customer_reviews.author: linda russell

customer_reviews.title: Everything is great except the power adapter can fail due to overheating
customer_reviews.text: The light is great, good function and form, made very well. Only issue is the AC adapter gets very hot, and eventually failed, but it lasted a bit more than a year before it died. The light still works when I use my wife's AC adapter, so I know its the adapter that is the issue. Her's gets very hot as well and will guess it will fail eventually as well. Seems like Cheri in 2017 had a similar problem.
customer_reviews.author: Alpinist

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, would not order from this seller again
customer_reviews.text: This lamp worked well for one use. The next morning the power supply broke off within the lamp. Poor quality, would not order from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: jj117

customer_reviews.title: It uses PWM.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the actual light, because it apparently uses pulse-width modulation (PWM) at all times, even on maximum brightness while plugged in, which means the light isn't actually constant. I attached an example from slow motion video at 960 fps using 1/12800 shutter speed at 5500 kelvin. The frequency is fast enough where the strobing is not visible to the eye, but one could still possibly feel the effects and sense the fact that it's flashing very fast. For a health light, that one must have very close to their eyes, I expect constant current where it does not flicker at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lamp died very quickly
customer_reviews.text: This light stopped working after using it only a handful of times. Definitely DO NOT buy this product--it is very poorly made!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: This lamp fulfills its purpose, and can help with SAD
customer_reviews.text: I've had this light for a few months now, and while using it doesn't make all my depressive symptoms go away it has helped me in terms of focus (I suspect it's because in my case, my depression is caused by multiple factors rather than just SAD/not receiving enough sunlight). My symptoms are intermittent, and usually affects my concentration to the extent I can't focus on completing homework assignments or planning activities. Using this lamp during those times has helped significantly.
customer_reviews.author: prakna

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality control
customer_reviews.text: After only 3 months of minimal use and I am generally a careful person with fragile parts - power connector broke when unplugging. I do not see a way to contact seller and seek a replacement power adapter - very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Yu L.

customer_reviews.title: No internal timer. Will not work with an external ...
customer_reviews.text: No internal timer. Will not work with an external 'vacation' timer either. Once power is lost/cut (or the plug pulled) when that is restored a touch-sensitive power button must be used to turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and portable, but not certain of its effectivity
customer_reviews.text: This is a nicely sized unit for light therapy. I have been using for about a week, and jury is still out on its effectivity. In the AM, I use for 1 hour on the brightest setting about a foot away from my face just off to the side of my face (per the instructions). I do feel it helps to "wake me up" for the the day, but as far as improving my sleep, that hasn't happened. I even tried an hour in the AM and an hour right after lunch without any major changes.
customer_reviews.author: chiquitita230

customer_reviews.title: Effective bright light from a streamlined lamp.
customer_reviews.text: This light has been extremely effective. I have SAD and had been looking for a light for myself for a couple of winters. There are so many variables to consider when choosing one. I chose this one due to a review I read on Amazon. . Within 3 days I knew that I'd made the right choice. I have since purchased one for a best friend and another for my sister. From the very bright light to the sleek streamlined shape, this is by far a great choice in light therapy.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary V

customer_reviews.title: Warranty? Defective adapter making unit useless
customer_reviews.text: The adapter tip is lodged in the unit and the cord has an exposed pin and all attempts to reseat and have contact and connectivity have not been successful. Another consumer has posted a photo that shows the issue. I am disappointed that Circadian Optics has not responded to my request for warranty service. I would like to think Circadian stands behind their products because this was a nice light but not worth the cost if defects not addressed and warranty coverage available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get any anti-depressant effects from this lamp and since that's what it's for, I only gave it 2 stars. Used it every day, about 30-45 mins, as recommended, for at least 2 weeks. Also, I would have added another star because it's a powerful lamp, but for some idiotic reason, they made the base rounded. It SO MUCH LESS stable that way, especially if you have it set up like a reading lamp. It's just way too top heavy, and only takes a light tap to knock it over. Why they ever designed the base to be rounded on the edges, I will never, ever, understand. Brain-dead design choice.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: good lamp - have to re-plug it in every time
customer_reviews.text: The lamp works well - great light just the way science says it is best. The plug, however, is faulty. If I move it (literally move it 2 inches on the table, close it, adjust the angle etc), I have to plug it back in (in the lamp, not at the wall). I love the design of it, folding flat for travel and storage, adjustable to exactly how you are sitting...but having to remove the plug every single time that I use it or move it during use is getting pretty old.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very good, until it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Light was very bright. Excellent for reading first thing in the morning. But it failed after about a month of use, about 30 minutes daily. Brief buzz and went dead. I will contact manufacturer to see if they stand behind the product. Update: Customer service is excellent. They replied promptly to email and shipped out a new unit right away. When I received the new unit it worked perfectly. I was curious and tried the new power supply and old lamp, and that combination works perfectly too. So the power supply failed, not the lamp. Rating increased to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Gappy

customer_reviews.title: Have patience and pay attention to your body
customer_reviews.text: Very substantial unit. No problems as stated by others. Light is very bright which is great since 10,000 lux is suggested. You can make less bright with 3 settings. Comfotable to set up. I use it an hour a day as reading light. Light is bent over to read. Lamp is about 8-10" from my head. Light hits my eyes from an angle. I don't look directly at light but side to side and above. I need this for crappy sleep pattern. Nothing works so far. I hope this is it. I have only had it 5 days but i feel brighter and have a little more energy.
customer_reviews.author: susan sherman

customer_reviews.title: Good for what ails you.
customer_reviews.text: My wife got this for when she visits me in Milwaukee , where I am spending the winter. I have noticed a definite improvement in her mood over when she didn't have it yet in the fall. She also notes an improvement in her "fog brain." We used to live in New Hampshire where daylength/sun exposure were low in winter and it was rough on her. Unfortunately these lights were not available then. Even in our current home in Virginia she finds the light helpful. Definitely recommend this for anyone who suffers from seasonal affect issues. It packs down small, is built sturdily and solidly.
customer_reviews.author: mach1

customer_reviews.title: Helps chase S.A.D away!
customer_reviews.text: I have this facing my peripheral vision while working and it has helped TREMENDOUSLY!!! BUT after 9 months of daily use and struggling with the temperamental power cord it will only light up to the fist power level if I'm lucky!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Horrigan

customer_reviews.title: What a disappointment! I loved everything about this lamp and used ...
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment! I loved everything about this lamp and used it daily for about 3 weeks. Unfortunately, the prong that inserts into the lamp base became frayed after only using it for 3 weeks. I truly hope that Circadian Optics is able to correct this problem as the lamp exceeded my requirements in all other ways. However, not wanting to start a fire with this lamp, due to it's poorly made plug, I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Rose VC

customer_reviews.title: stay away if you're using it to wake up with a timer
customer_reviews.text: Bought because my room doesnt have a window to sunlight and wanted to set it up with a smart switch to wake me up in the morning. Turns out when the power cycles it doesn't stay on. The design is also just weird, theres really only one position it stands in so it makes little sense for it to be so flexible. It's too bad because the light from it is wonderful... I just wish it had the features I needed beyond that.
customer_reviews.author: Tarunraj

customer_reviews.title: Much needed in cloudy upstate NY
customer_reviews.text: We have had almost 3 months of nonstop rain and clouds in NY. All I wanted to do was sleep! This has helped with energy and ambition to get things done. I use it on the brightest setting for about 15-30 min a day. I have been using it about 10 days now. It's slim line so easy to fit almost anywhere. It can be a little top heavy when the light is fully straightened up so just be aware of that. I am enjoying it and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol H.

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: I love the flexibility of this light therapy lamp. It can adjust to so many angles, allowing me to angle the light toward me from above eye level, which seems most comfortable for me, or I can bring it to eye level or below for more intensity. Since it can be used without a cord, I can set it exactly where I want it. I have charged it once, and been using it for nearly a week for 30-60 min. a day, without a loss of brightness. The quality seems very good. I bought the grey one, and it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra026

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Seasonal Depression
customer_reviews.text: Doctor recommended using light therapy to combat seasonal depression symptoms, opted to try this product for several reasons 1. Product development by an inventor from Minnesota (same region, limited sunlight working in an office 12 to 16 hours a day) 2. Looks like your basic desk lamp and doesn't look like a giant sun tanning unit drawing attention from coworkers. 3. Simple, adjustable design. 4. Multiple light settings and sits off to the side, just needs to be in your field of vision. Also it's on the stylish side. As for if it solved my problem, it certainly helped.
customer_reviews.author: dlee

customer_reviews.title: Probably helping!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews on these lamps and settled with this one. I was diagnosed with SAD in a research study and decided to supplement other supports with a lamp. I try to use it for at least 15 minutes each morning (during breakfast), setting it on the arm of my recliner so that it's fairly close and pointed at me. I can't say 100% that it's making things better, but I seem to be getting to bed more easily in the evening and haven't had quite as much of the winter blues. It's a small monetary investment but seems worthwhile to try.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin K

customer_reviews.title: Seems all right so far
customer_reviews.text: Really, I think you should review things a year after you buy them so you can give a real example of if they work or not. That said, I started using this light at work for about an hour each day, and I don't know if it's related or not, but when I woke up this morning, I actually felt good. Of course they want you to use the light at the same time each day, which I can't with my work schedule. There are three brightness settings and even the lowest one seems a bit bright to me, but it felt better by the end of the week.
customer_reviews.author: Sarai

customer_reviews.title: Solid Performing Compact Lamp with a Base Stability Issue
customer_reviews.text: This is a very compact lamp for light therapy. My wife loves it. I love it, except that the base is so small, it's unstable (it's well-balanced, but the slightest touch causes it to fall over). I'd prefer a larger base. Other than that, It's a great lamp. If you don't use it where it's occasionally bumped and you need a compact therapy lamp, it might work out well for you!
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Bright, compact, sturdy therapy light
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light after consulting with my doctor about seasonal affective disorder. While I haven't yet tested it through the winter months, I notice a difference in my mood the days I use the light before work. My office space really doesn't have a window, and my apartment is fairly urban, so getting good light is difficult outside of my daily commute and walks. This light has been an easy integration into my daily routine, blending into my desk set up. It easily folds down and hides behind my monitors when not in use, and is easy to turn on and off through the contact button.
customer_reviews.author: FormerBestBuySchmuck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect lamp for my desk. I like how I can adjust it, angle it towards my face and the sleek design and that it has different brightness settings.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin D

customer_reviews.title: Unstable so don't get it if you have pets or kids, but it works.
customer_reviews.text: I feel the difference already, more alert in the afternoons. That's when I'd lose energy here in Vermont. Dark grey days. Now I turn this on in around 3pm and I keep going easily. Odd, I know. The bad, it's a stupid design. Incredibly unstable. Side to side, back and forth, unstable. If you have dogs, cats, kids, movement in the house, move your laptop, a cup of coffee, it falls over. It's a base of what 1.5 by 3 inches? And fully extended is 24 - 30 inches tall? Narrow and tall. I feel like i have to build a wall around it to protect it. Absolutely useless design.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Compact and bright
customer_reviews.text: I really like the compact design and used this lamp several days a week since I bought it in November 2017, but it just died - a few months after the 2-year warranty was up. Edit: Good news, which has caused me to revise the rating back to 5 stars, is the Circadian Optics has offered to replace my defective unit at no charge.
customer_reviews.author: user x

customer_reviews.title: Product as described, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I like this light a lot. I should have gotten a bigger one, though, as this is a pretty small light. Because this light is so small I feel like I need to hold it very close to my face, so I can’t really do anything while I’m using it. If I had bought a larger one then I could hang it on the wall a few feet from where I sit and it would be better. However, if you’re short on money it does work well, but you need to be on top of it. Good product,though, and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Valarie Boro

customer_reviews.title: Happy lamps rule - this is a great one.
customer_reviews.text: Been using 6 weeks or so most weekdays in the morning for between 30 min and 3 hours depending on what my workday looks like. Noticed immediate mood elevation and energy, waking up very regularly as well. If you're on the fence about a therapy lamp, get this one, it's small, attractive, and for me at least, has been an excellent tool to preempt SAD
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Swigert

customer_reviews.title: Doing its job to boost energy
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. While I’ve only been using it for a few days, I noticed an increase in energy almost immediately. This is what I was after! I’m hoping it will also help with sleep issues.... I use the second brightest setting and started with 10 minutes, increasing1- 2 minutes a day to 30 minutes. This is the time frame my schedule will allow so it will hopefully be sufficient. I also love the compact size as I live in a small home and hate clutter. I’m able to fold it and stow it easily after use.
customer_reviews.author: 1whoknew

customer_reviews.title: This light is a god send
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this portable light for my office cube. Very bright but has three different settings. I like the way you can swivel the light around to face it the way you want. The design is sleek and looks cool in your cube. Personally, I have not noticed better sleep but I will keep using it as the MN winters are long. The best thing is how this company was founded and the inspiring back story of the owner as seen on Shark Tank - check it out!
customer_reviews.author: Bellaboo

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Seasonal Affective Disorder Lamp!!
customer_reviews.text: Treatment for SAD for me was changed by phototherapy. As I sit very close to the lamp, allowing the light to permeate my mind and body, I remind myself that depression is not a "fault". Instead, it is a change in my need for certain frequencies of light and with that exposure to light, my thoughts are more pleasant and realistic. So, I decided to change the world around me. I moved to California and brought my sun lamp with me. The two best decisions I have made!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lamp consistently falls over
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is very unsteady and falls over anytime I need to adjust it. It has fallen so many times that it now does not completely close.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Pitcavage

customer_reviews.title: I’m glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical. I was told about it by a nurse friend and she swore by it. I’m now a believer. I even did an experiment by using it a week, not using it a week and then back to using it again. This thing works. It hardly takes up any space at all. I keep it in my bathroom and I put it on while I’m getting ready.
customer_reviews.author: J_E_27

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works. Better mood. More energy.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works. I was about one more winter from taking a permanent swim in the Hudson. I started with the light thinking " it can't make things any worse". Best purchase I ever made. My mood has improved drastically and I have way more energy! Thanks, I think you saved my life.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Miller

customer_reviews.title: Four months and stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the look of this light therapy lamp and it does what it is meant to. It is also easy to use everyday. However after four months of use it has completely stopped working. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: What I like best is that you can maneuver this is to so many positions. I have it on a table next to the couch to use while I drink my coffee and watch news in the morning. Because of all the positions I can kinda hook it over the pillow and have it pretty close to me. Only wish it was a bit wider for a broader range of light. I use the standard plug not the usb. Thanks to another reviewer for pointing out that it has 3 brightness settings. Update: I't the following winter (in Wisconsin) and I still love this and am happy to see it's got new packaging so it should be around for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Sade

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, bright, tiny, convenient, great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp as a replacement/addition to my sadlight. That was a $200 purchase many years ago and still works great but I was worried I wasn't getting 10.000 lux. So for added insurance I bought this unit. It is so powerful, so tiny, and so convenient, I had to buy a 2nd one for my wife too. She brings hers with her to and from work. It transports so easily. Price is very reasonable. Works better than my big bulky SADelight
customer_reviews.author: Fred L

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp and superior design (4.8 Stars)
customer_reviews.text: I tried to save money getting competitors lamp (image attached - ball type lamp) and it was blinding. I needed something that could be optional on my face and time where I just want it on arms. This one does the trip. Just opened it five minutes ago. One opportunity for future designs is heavier base. It can tip easily. Losing an entire star for this is a bit much. I'd drop it .2 for this giving it 4.8 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ralph

customer_reviews.title: I like the multi-use aspect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to see if light therapy would help my sleeping patterns. I chose this model because the larger Circadian models had many reviews indicating they were somewhat fragile, and in my opinion, their size made them impractical for travel. I like the multi-use aspect, since I can turn it on the highest setting for light therapy, then lower the intensity to use it as a desk lamp. Perfect to slip in a suitcase, and for a motorhome or tiny house living. How much this changes my sleep is not clear yet, but either way this product is well made, was delivered quickly, and seems a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help with season depression. I work in a basement and hardly see day light in the winter. I’m not sure if it’s helping to be honest but I love how it’s part of my routine now. After a month or so I had issues with the light turning off. I did trouble shooting but didn’t work so I contacted the company (per the directions it came with). They responded immediately and after showing proof of purchase then sent me a new one. Their customer service was prompt, friendly and super easy. Def recommended
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Freese

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical, but it actually helped.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that this would work, but it totally helped. I tend to crash in the winter time right around 2:30/3:00. On the days I have my light on it just doesn’t happen. Instructions suggest to use the light in the morning, but I really find it useful to use in the early afternoon instead. The sleek design of this light makes it easy to put on a desk without taking up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Eggdog

customer_reviews.title: Small, flexible, and bright
customer_reviews.text: We have found the full-spectrum lighting makes a big difference in the winter months in the northern latitudes, and this one is attractive, with a small footprint. Its adjustable body and dimmable light adds to its utility. My husband's study, which can be sepulchral in the winter, is pleasant and bathed in vivid light. It allows him to work through the day even when it gets dark early.
customer_reviews.author: Mary McCombie

customer_reviews.title: ... is not very wide or stable so it tips easily. I do like the way it folds up ...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn't give 5 stars was that the base is not very wide or stable so it tips easily. I do like the way it folds up so compact since I carry it to work when I am on night shifts. I also like that I am able to rotate the light as I need. It has three brightness settings which is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jaerie

customer_reviews.title: Bright, Nice Versatile Design, but Wobbly when Standing Up
customer_reviews.text: The Circadian lamp is bright, brighter than the more expensive round Circadian model. Its supposed to be 10,000 lux but its not as bright as a 2000 lumin shop light. It is unstable when standing up unless on a firm table top. It won't stand up on a picnic table. But it can be used lying on its side. Its brighter outside than the sun when in the shade, so I use it outside. It can be used as a work lamp, but not an evening reading lamp as its very white. You need to tape on wood shims to make it more stable. That works against its elegant design.
customer_reviews.author: Accord

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for people with SAD
customer_reviews.text: I'm not big on following trends or trying gimmicks. But, after battling seasonal depression in a northern cold and gray climate, I had to try something. I couldn't believe how much of a positive impact this had after just a few days. I use it for about 20-30 minutes each morning while catching up on emails, and it really brightens my mood. It is very slim, so it doesn't take up much space. BUT, with it being that slim, it isn't very sturdy and has fallen over a few times. But it never broke when it fell.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Not good if you have migraines
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and compact. Travels easily with a small footprint. Unfortunately, the bright white light causes me to have migraines. I have tried it several times but every time I use it, my headache worsens and turns into a migraine. I have done fine with the yellow light of another device that I have, but it is really large and to big to bring to work.
customer_reviews.author: Kat'sKorner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect unit for an invaluable therapy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit based on reviews, and am happy to say it goes above and beyond. For convenience it sits on my desk at work. I use it discreetly for the 1st 30 minutes or so that I am at my desk. The unit is sleek and looks simply like another device on a desk, such as a speaker. But the light therapy has made a difference in my mood in just a few days. I would highly recommend this unit for use wherever the timing of your light therapy finds you. My only regret is that it does not have a timer.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K. Hoopes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I very rarely give things a 5 star. This one deserves it! I like how functional it is and how easy it is to pack it on a trip. That is not something I had thought about doing but when a trip came up, I couldnt find a reason to not take it. My only feedback is that the cable easily comes off from the back of the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The woman touched my heart on Shark Tank and she had the best product I had ever seen that I needed. It wakes me up in the morning simulating the sun and being safe. It wakes me up before I go out of the house. It is made to get your time clock going and it does! Cudos to her and for providing a truly useful item I needed! Very high quality too!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Quisenberry

customer_reviews.title: No longer sketptical
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about these lights actually impacting how I felt during the dark days of winter. However, I immediately noticed an instant difference in my energy and enthusiasm in the mornings. I use it 20 - 40 minutes while I wake up with a cup of coffee and read the morning news each day.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H

customer_reviews.title: Small lamp, big help
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect in my office. I have larger light box at home. Office mates borrow it in dingy days. 20-30 minutes in the morning is all it takes to feel improvement from SAD
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: Well, we’ll see this winter.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve just started using this lamp, so I don’t know yet how effective it will be. However, it’s a handy little unit that folds up for ease of travel. That trim design and light weight however, makes the lamp unstable at times. Because it is tall, thin and easy to manipulate, it is quite easy to tip it over. A little more weight in the base would be helpful. Overall, I think it’s a great design.
customer_reviews.author: mrsv

customer_reviews.title: Life changer
customer_reviews.text: For many years I've struggled in the winter months with the winter time blues. It wasn't bad enough I had to go see a doctor, but I just dealt with it as more of a hassle. This device has helped with my overall attitude, energy level and I sleep great because of it. For me, I think the most important thing is that I have noticed that I sleep through the night without waking up several times which is contributing to my attitude and energy levels. I highly recommend using this lamp if you are not getting good sleep or have the winter time blues.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I’m completely satisfied with my Circadian Optics Lumos 2.0 therapy lamp. I was looking for a light therapy lamp that would fit on my already over crowded computer desk. This lamp was a perfect fit and that makes it quite easy to use every day while I’m working on my laptop. Great product and I wouldn’t hesitate to return to Circadian Optics and their products.
customer_reviews.author: Mel T

customer_reviews.title: Effects effective within days
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. It almost seems too good to be true but I can honestly say that I feel more upbeat and have a little more energy after 3 days. I put this light in my bathroom and have it on while getting ready for work in the morning. I purchased the tall slim model which sits nicely on my toilet and shines directly on me while getting ready. I would highly recommend this product to everyone who suffers from SAD.
customer_reviews.author: D. Handrick

customer_reviews.title: Loose plug in.
customer_reviews.text: Bright. The connector from device to wall plug is loose and must be in a certain position to stay attached and functionable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific light box for SAD
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! It's a nice size for a table, and folds up after use. Three levels of brightness give the user options. Best of all, it works! I noticed an improvement in mood after only five days!
customer_reviews.author: CHS

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this light. Very compact, very bright! I only end up using the low setting and it's plenty bright for me. I have also been using as my crafting light so I can get the benefits of the light and it is brighter than the expensive one I had bought specifically for crafting
customer_reviews.author: laurel

customer_reviews.title: My wake-up time has become more regular and less groggy!
customer_reviews.text: Might be placebo but my sleeping/ waking up schedule has become more regular after this. I turn it on as soon as I wake up for about 30 to an hour (sometimes few hours) in the lowest setting and I study while it is on. I don't feel as groggy when waking up anymore!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonWarrior

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted one month!
customer_reviews.text: The product was great for one month but today it just completely quit and I have used it for less than a month. We used it according to directions and were careful with it so it was not misuse that caused the problem.
customer_reviews.author: L Boyz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the changes they made - the old design worked much better
customer_reviews.text: Giving one star because I think it's poor taste to change something to a worse design -It cannot be used remotely without the plug anymore ; the one I had before which I gave to a friend could be used without the plut -It overheats which is a hazard in the panel above the light
customer_reviews.author: Karen Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for insomnia caused by glowing screen or perpetually cloudy skies!
customer_reviews.text: Owned this circadian light for a year now and it works great. Didn't know this was the secret to my insomnia, and why I slowly stay up later and later. Only use it about once or twice a week now. I highly recommend pairing this with a fitbit watch or other device that can track your sleep, so you can get an accurate idea of how you're really sleeping and what might need to change.
customer_reviews.author: Caarrl

customer_reviews.title: Big help with wife’s winter blues!
customer_reviews.text: With 5 children in NH, my wife gets very down with SAD from October through April. The depression, once it sets in, just saps the life out of her. I bought her this light after reading a number of reviews - wow, it’s made a HUGE difference for her. Her energy level is higher, she’s generally in a better mood, and when she does feel depressed, she’s able to rebound out of it. The quality is great so far, and I’ve noticed it helps me wake up, too.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Plug fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Was really disappointed when the plug came apart leaving part in the light. Only used a few times before it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This product is lightweight and easy to use, The small stand provided, which was a small piece of plastic that slid on the bottom which was secured by a plastic tip that slid in and locked in a slot. the Plastic tip broke off the first night. The light stood well with out the stand piece, and also when it was on it covered up the arrow, that shows which way to twist the light to adjust it, Great price, and bot my my wife use this product as directed and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great design and brightness
customer_reviews.text: I have one of those old clunky and expensive light therapy boxes from years ago. I hardly ever used it in recent years primarily because I didn’t want to leave it set up all the time. This lamp is so elegantly designed. I love the flexibility of how to position the light. For such a small unit the light is quite bright and since it’s is so unobtrusive it can stay where I will use each morning. I’m so glad to have read a review for another light product that mentioned this one. It’s exactly what I want!
customer_reviews.author: sandra holte

customer_reviews.title: Believe it works!
customer_reviews.text: These dreary, cloudy days of winter affect my energy level so thought I would give this lamp a try. So far I like it since it's slim and very portable. It's found a place on my kitchen desk where I start my morning and feel like it gets me off to a great start to the day - along with my coffee of course. It is very unobtrusive, especially when it's closed. The three light levels gives me flexibility so I can adjust it accordingly but so far I have it on low and it works for me. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Love this light!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a light for many years now and have found it quite effective in treating SAD. Recently I dropped my old bulky fixture and needed a replacement. My comparison shopping led me to Circadian Optics and I couldn’t be more pleased. I’ve had my new lamp for about a month now and am completely pleased with it. It is sleek, unobtrusive, effective and very reasonably priced! I also appreciate the company’s extra warranty and dedication to customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy H

customer_reviews.title: Desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Very bright. Different type of white light than my LED lamps. Works really well. Also, seems to reduce the eye fatigue I get with other lights/lamps after extended periods of reading. Sits on desk and have not removed the plug in the back, thus have not had any problems with the most common complication I've read on Amazon about the adapter plug insert not being well constructed. It sits on my desk and so I don't keep pulling that out.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: High quality and good value.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made product, solid and sturdy, yet compact. It has a small footprint so it doesn't take up much space and can easily be tucked away when not in use. I like the way the light bar can be rotated into different positions and I likethe three levels of brightness to choose from. I have only been using Lumos every morning for about a week so it too early to say how it affects mood and sleep patterns but I do feel as if I have more energy and a happy outlook.
customer_reviews.author: Catspaw

customer_reviews.title: Completely Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My Circadian Optics Lumos Lamp lived up to its description. I live on the east side of Cleveland where, due to lake effect weather conditions, skies are gray in the winter 90% of the time. (I even considered moving to the west side of Cleveland because lake effect doesn't happen there and skies are often brighter.) First thing in the morning I sit in the kitchen with my coffee, crossword puzzles, and Lumos lamp. Early days, but I actually do feel better since I started. Maybye it's psychological, I don't know. I only know I feel better. Firm believer here.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia G.

customer_reviews.title: Bright and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Works great slender but tall. Base is fairly stable depending on how you position the light bar portion of lamp. Has 3 brightness settings but recommends using the highest setting? Improvement would be to have a timer on lamp so you could program 30 mins. or 60 minutes then auto shutoff. But maintain the manual on off feature. I would buy again. Note used for only 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Pegavas1

customer_reviews.title: Well-designed - Great features - The perfect full-spectrum lamp!
customer_reviews.text: What a difference this lamp has made for me these dark Seattle winter days! Fifteen to thirty minutes each morning (within the recommended distance from the lamp) has taken me from "hibernation" mode to "alert & well-being" energy to get my day started. My daughter, who suffers from chronic fatigue syndrome, has found it to be a real help to her, as well. This is a very well-designed lamp, good quality, and has a small "footprint" - taking up only a few inches on a tabletop. It is easily portable/packable, and the many adjustable configurations and the option of three brightness intensities make it so comfortable to use. A great find!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: What I expected and more!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with product. Like petite size but powerful light! Love how it folds to resting position when not using! Thanks for the 'heads up' re: symptoms of headache, etc. I started slow at 30 minutes on med setting and increased gradually. Really feel energized and alert! Would recommend this product! TY! Judy
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product that works exactly as described and is super easy to use, compact, and well-made. A worthwhile buy!
customer_reviews.author: Andreia

customer_reviews.title: What a difference!
customer_reviews.text: The only regret I have is that I didn't find this product sooner! As a sufferer of SAD, there were many days that I simply could not function for the entire day and my frame of mind was horrible. This light has been a lifesaver! I have it on my bathroom counter and turn it on for about 15 minutes while I'm getting ready for work in the mornings. Occasionally I'll use it a second time during the day while I'm in the kitchen making lunch, but once is really enough. I could tell a tremendous difference the very first day! I highly recommend this product if you struggle with the short, dark days of winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am using this as a desk lamp and the base is very small so I can see this tipping easily, but I knew this when I bought it
customer_reviews.text: the first unit was defective, but was quickly replaced. the new light works well and the customer service is outstanding . I am using this as a desk lamp and the base is very small so I can see this tipping easily, but I knew this when I bought it. the removal of one star was solely for the defect
customer_reviews.author: stone384

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to my morning routine
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if I technically have seasonal affective disorder, probably not, but I do know that the gray skies and dark rainy days in Seattle can be rough in the winter. I decided to give this a try and it has been a good addition to my daily routine. I just point it at me for 60-90 min in the morning while I type at my computer \and it seems make the world a better place. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Gaby in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The charger broke the first hour of use - I cannot return as I had thrown away the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Selin Gulcelik

customer_reviews.title: Sunny inside!
customer_reviews.text: The little light machine works well and seems to be having a positive effect. The light was a bit difficult to set up because instruction booklet doesn't deal with how to stand it, and turn/twist the light to operational position. Once we figured that out, seems after one week to be of excellent quality/effect.
customer_reviews.author: James E Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I got this lamp because I'm seriously affected by lack of sunlight. I work in an office with no windows, and during the winter months it's dark when I get to work, and dark when I leave. I've had it for 2 days and love it. It's small and compact, so it sits on my desk easily. It's adjustable to a lot of positions. It has already literally brightened my days LOL. I do feel in a much better mood using it and my desk doesn't feel as depressing anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, non-intrusive design that works great!
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. It provides the simulated sunlight I miss out on living in the Midwest through the winter months. It's sleek design sits on my desk without drawing unwanted attention. When someone does comment on it, they want to know how to get one. Great product and I couldn't be happier. I definitely recommend this product to anyone needing a little light therapy in their day.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal Franks

product_meta.title: Circadian Optics Lumos 2.0 Light Therapy Lamp | As Seen On Shark Tank | 10,000 LUX Ultra Bright LED | Full Spectrum UV Free | Adjustable Light Panel | Turn On Your Day
feature_bullets: ✔ BEST-SELLER, FEATURED ON THE TODAY SHOW WITH DR OZ AND ON SHARK TANK | Showcased on the Today Show with Dr Oz and on Shark Tank, the Lumos is our original, top-selling lamp.

✔ MOST ADJUSTABLE LAMP, EASY TO USE: It's rotating light panel gives it excellent flexibility, allowing you to place, position and direct the lamp in a way that maximizes your light therapy session. Our lamp's revolutionary, quick one-touch operation makes it simple to use. No complicated settings to mess around with. 3 levels allows you to customize the brightness for the best efficacy and comfort.

✔ EFFECTIVE BRIGHTNESS, FULL-SPECTRUM, WHITE LIGHT, UV-FREE | Provides the recommended 10,000 LUX brightness for effective light therapy to help beat the winter blues, regulate sleep, fight fatigue, boost mood, and improve focus. Our lamps produce high-quality light with the right qualities - Pure-white color of the noonday sun (5500K), full-spectrum, and free of unwanted UV rays.

✔ LONGER LASTING LEDS, 2 YEAR WARRANTY, 2019 MODEL UPGRADES | LEDs last approximately 50,000 hours, many times longer than fluorescent bulbs, meaning no replacing expensive bulbs ever again. Both lamp and adapter are covered by Circadian Optic's comprehensive 2 year warranty. 2019 model improvements include a tighter fitting adapter plug and a cooler running lamp.
✔ BASED IN MINNEAPOLIS, MINNESOTA | Designed in the USA, our lamps are meant to stand out, but in a good way. Our mission is to provide effective light therapy in a beautifully designed lamp.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
